title: How should I study for a BA (Hons.) in English from SOL? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Arts Degrees in English with Honors
School of Open Learning, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: Situation 1 - If you just want to pass the exams with normal marks then Study with the help of Past year questions papers (normally called 10 Years). You can easily find this books on any book shop. Normally the question Paper of SOL repeats every year (most of the questions). So, just for passing criteria you should go through 10 Years. Situation 2 - But, if you want to gain knowledge, be the expert in that subject or Want full knowledge then please Study SOL’s Books + 10 Years + Original English Textbooks from the Market in which full detail about the every subject/Topic is provided + Consult with your teacher + discuss with your friends and Try to study daily. Hope this will help You ! Thank you !
